sentences.en: The central section of the book is a historical overview of drug use.
sentences.cn: 本书的中心部分是对药物使用的一个历史概述。

sentences.en: It's a thoughtful examination of the dangers of our computing overdose and a historical overview of how technological advances change consciousness.
sentences.cn: 这是对我们过度使用计算机的危险的深刻考察，也是对技术进步如何改变意识的历史概述。

sentences.en: This wide-ranging introduction to the study of autobiography offers a historical overview of autobiographical writing from St Augustine to the present day.
sentences.cn: 这本自传研究的广泛介绍提供了从圣奥古斯丁到今天的自传写作的历史概述。
